r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Use strlcpy() rather than strncpy() to comply with PECL standards. Stricter type-matching, initialize all allocated memory. Improve unit test implementation. Enable SUCCESS_WITH_INFO to return results successfully (bug 6561). Handle null characters within SQL values (bug 6572). Avoid appending a null character to CLOB values (bug 6755). Enable default cursor type to be set as a connection attribute. Provide initial support and testing for native XML data type. Improve variable scope binding
